author: Lyzza
title: How A Top Student Ended Up Picking Potatoes: #15Girls
text: Posts: 1,319 How A Top Student Ended Up Picking Potatoes: #15Girls Oh my god, this is so fucking sad I want to vomit. Seriously. This asshole with the stick needs it shoved up his butt. Beating refugee kids working for him in the fields! What the fuck is going on here?! And people want to piss and moan about how "dangerous" and "scary" these Syrian refugees are?! Oh my fucking god
